name: MDLTextureFilter
desc: A description of filtering modes for a renderer to use when sampling from a texture.

items.name: var sWrapMode: MDLMaterialTextureWrapMode
items.desc: The coordinate wrapping mode for texture t-coordinates.

items.name: var tWrapMode: MDLMaterialTextureWrapMode
items.desc: The coordinate wrapping mode for texture t-coordinates.

items.name: var rWrapMode: MDLMaterialTextureWrapMode
items.desc: The coordinate wrapping mode for texture r-coordinates.

items.name: var minFilter: MDLMaterialTextureFilterMode
items.desc: The filter mode for rendering textures at sizes smaller than that of the original image.

items.name: var magFilter: MDLMaterialTextureFilterMode
items.desc: The filter mode for rendering textures at sizes larger than that of the original image.

items.name: var mipFilter: MDLMaterialMipMapFilterMode
items.desc: The filter mode for rendering textures using mipmapping.

items.name: enum MDLMaterialTextureWrapMode
items.desc: Modes for sampling textures at coordinates outside the texture bounds, used by the sWrapMode, tWrapMode, and rWrapMode properties.

items.name: enum MDLMaterialTextureFilterMode
items.desc: Modes for sampling textures at coordinates between texels, used by the minFilter and magFilter properties.

items.name: enum MDLMaterialMipMapFilterMode
items.desc: Modes for sampling textures at sizes between mipmap levels, used by the mipFilter property.
